title: Tage des Regens
abstract: Days of Rain tells the story of a boy and his family in central Vietnam taking up the challenge of building a new home. Quynh lives with his family in a simple hut in central Vietnam. Its rainy season, the time when their village is repeatedly flooded. Now a governmental program relocates their village to a new area. Building the new house will be a chance and challenge for the entire family.
credits: Cinematography and Direction by Andreas Hartmann
festivals: Toronto Reel Asian Intl Film Festival 2010
